James, a man with nothing to lose, owed his life to his older brother Frankie after taking the rap for a crime they did together.
While Frankie served time, James worked to turn his life around, He manages to get a job and begins courting with his girlfriend Emily .
Now, Frankie is released and back on the streets with no money and no place to go, all that's left is for him and James to commit a heist unlike any other.
